NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 MELORAE: What just happened?! Was the island was just.. launched into space by a cyclone?! 2 1 MELORAE: Brace yourselves, everybody! We're about to crash back into the planet's atmosphere! 3 2 PLUME: We appear to have landed back in the planet's waves.. Is everyone well? 4 3 THATCH: As well as we can be... My suit was just beginning to dry from the rain! That plunge into the ocean has just soaked me thoroughly again! 5 4 COLEUS: I checked the shuttle and it thankfully appears well, even after that crash. Imagine if we became stranded on this planet.. 6 5 THATCH: Imagine if we simply returned to the shuttle and left this terrifying planet right now instead! 7 6 MELORAE: We may have to do just that if another cyclone approaches.. But goodness, this planet is far more treacherous than I could have anticipated. 8 7 MELORAE: We must think of some way protect ourselves from these cyclones; or better yet, seek a landmass entirely clear of the path of the cyclones to settle on! Pioneer R1 1 Pioneer EX1 1 Pioneer EX2 6 Pioneer_I R1 6
